channel.title: Remove the leeches from the server list
channel.description: Just look at the mess on http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php theres a total of 358 Servers which ill guess around 300 of them are just downloaded, no effort at all in changing anything and put online so the "owner" can ask for money in the form of "donations"

item.title: Remove the leeches from the server list
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

When something is released to the public for free and open source it isn’t a leech just cause someone hosts that, unless you write your own damn base from scratch everyone calls it a leech now. So shut up.

Read full topic
item.source: Remove the leeches from the server list
